event_categories.name: Aerospace Engineering
event_categories.description: The primary field of engineering concerned with the development of aircraft and spacecraft.

event_categories.name: Astronomy
event_categories.description: A natural science that studies celestial objects and phenomena.

event_categories.name: Athletics
event_categories.description: Competitions based on human qualities of stamina, fitness, and skill.

event_categories.name: Concert
event_categories.description: A live music performance in front of an audience.

event_categories.name: Course
event_categories.description: A unit of instruction in one subject, lasting one academic term.

event_categories.name: Environmental Science
event_categories.description: An interdisciplinary academic field that integrates physics, biology, and geography to the study of the environment, and the solution of environmental problems.

event_categories.name: Field Trip
event_categories.description: A trip made by students or research workers to study something at first hand.

event_categories.name: Film
event_categories.description: Works of visual art that simulate experiences and otherwise communicate ideas, stories, perceptions, feelings, beauty, or atmosphere through the use of moving images.

event_categories.name: Film Screening
event_categories.description: The displaying of a motion picture or film.

event_categories.name: Geology
event_categories.description: A branch of natural science concerned with Earth and other astronomical objects, the rocks of which it is composed, and the processes by which they change over time.

event_categories.name: History
event_categories.description: The systematic study and documentation of human activity.

event_categories.name: Lecture
event_categories.description: An oral presentation intended to present information or teach people about a particular subject.

event_categories.name: Literature
event_categories.description: A method of recording, preserving, and transmitting knowledge and entertainment, which can also have a social, psychological, spiritual, or political role.

event_categories.name: Mathematics
event_categories.description: The abstract science of number, quantity, and space.

event_categories.name: Music
event_categories.description: Vocal or instrumental sounds (or both) combined in such a way as to produce beauty of form, harmony, and expression of emotion.

event_categories.name: Northern European Comedy Film Festival
event_categories.description: A comedy film festival featuring directors from northern Europe.

event_categories.name: Physics
event_categories.description: The natural science that studies matter, its fundamental constituents, its motion and behavior through space and time, and the related entities of energy and force.

event_categories.name: Planetary Engineering
event_categories.description: The development and application of technology for the purpose of influencing the environment of a planet.

event_categories.name: Security
event_categories.description: Procedures followed or measures taken to ensure the safety of a state or organization.

event_categories.name: Special Event
event_categories.description: An individual event or celebrated date, such as a holiday.

event_categories.name: Training
event_categories.description: Practice or instruction to improve physical fitness or skill.
